# Recommended Skills
- doc-coauthoring: for structured documentation/specs and update guidance.
- mcp-builder: patterns for building MCP servers and tooling.
- xlsx / docx / pdf: for test matrices, proposals, and doc exports when needed.
- internal-comms: for status reports or stakeholder updates.

Copy/link these from your `~/.copilot/skills/` if available to enable richer workflows.
